description: We take a deep look at the Berzerker Warband Detachment for World Eaters and talk about what it does and how it plays.
title: Detachment Focus: Berzerker Warband

description: The Hernkyn Yaegirs take on the Genestealer Brood Brothers in Kill Team:Nightmare. Many thanks to Games Workshop for providing an advanced copy for review. title: Unboxing Kill Team Termination: Box Contents, Models, and Terrain Review

description: Greetings fellow Kyn. Let’s boldly march into unknown territory with our review of the hardy Hernkyn. Stout of constitution, and decked out in sweet drip the Hernkyn have arrived ready to style their way into our hearts. It’s not often when a weapon design smacks of such impracticality as the bolt shotgun, with its revolver […]
title: Kill Team: Termination – Hernkyn Yaegir Review

description: Greetings brave freedom fighters! TheArmorOfContempt(AoC) here to bring you my most anticipated review since I started doing them for Kill Team. As some of you know I am an avid Wyrmblade player, largely by coincidence, and this has slowly pulled me into being more and more committed to the Four Armed Emperor. It is also […]
title: Kill Team: Termination – Brood Brothers Review

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is back and covering the newly released Kill Team FAQs! He goes over all the changes so you don’t have to, from the changes to climbing gear, Nightmare kill teams as well as core rules changes!
title: CYRAC: May 2024 Kill Team FAQs and Erratas
